content.raw:
Changes in metadata needed:
http://wiki.debian.org/DebugPackage

Extra information about how symbols are stored and loaded by gdb:

GDB docs about how symbols can be stored in a different file:

http://sourceware.org/gdb/onlinedocs/gdb/Separate-Debug-Files.html

Good answer about how debug symbols are loaded into gdb

http://stackoverflow.com/a/10005800

How can someone check the symbol table:

http://sourceware.org/gdb/onlinedocs/gdb/Symbols.html
